name: Our Whole World
description:
Small Worms-like tank game made for Ludum Dare.

  • Destructible terrain!
  • Water Physics!
  • Explosions!
  • 3 Levels with story!
  • Dumb unfinished AI!
  • PvP mode (seriously this might me the only working thing!)

I have way better projects to work on so I'm releasing it source code tor you.
I'm not happy with the AI, it is dumb and require a lot of fixing. Also playing PvP players don't really know where they are. Some minimap or zoom out would be required.
